name: Droidz
description:
The Droidz of the title are convenience droids, made to do the boring tasks humans cannot be bothered to do, so they can go about and enjoy the pleasures life has to offer.
But these drones have now become intelligent and have all gathered to a the Holographic Recreation Center to collect all the high technology of the world.
The player's role is to roll in the MKIII battle walker and blast the revolting buggers to kingdom come. Droidz is a top down scrolling shooter where the objective is to make it to the exit of each level, a la Gauntlet. The walkers efficiency in fighting the enemies can be improved by picking up various upgrades and energy levels have to be monitored and replenished by gobbling up batteries along the way.
